# Hispanic Financial

> Professional financial, tax, and business consulting firm serving the Hispanic community in the United States since 2006.

## Company Information

- **Official Name:** Hispanic Financial
- **Founded:** 2006
- **Location:** 7401 Wiles Rd. Suite 126, Coral Springs, FL 33067, USA
- **Phone:** +1 954 509 3745
- **Email:** info@hispanictaxinc.com
- **Website:** https://www.hispanictaxinc.com
- **Languages:** English, Spanish (fully bilingual services)
- **Founder/CEO:** Alvaro Patino
- **Certifications:** AICPA, ACFE, AAA (American Accounting Association)

## Services Offered

### 1. Business Incorporation & Registration
- Articles and Certificate of Existence
- Employer Identification Number (EIN)
- Operating Agreement
- Corporate Kit (Minutes book, certificates, and shares)
- Preliminary tax planning
- Assistance in opening business bank accounts

### 2. Tax Preparation & Planning
- Personal income tax filing (IRS)
- Corporate tax preparation and filing
- Sales tax declaration preparation
- Tax planning for companies
- Payroll tax form filing

### 3. Real Estate Advisory
- Assistance in purchasing investment properties
- Analysis of impact on property sales for foreign investors
- Property sale tax optimization
- IRS withholding claims (FIRPTA)
- Tax declarations for foreign investors

### 4. Wealth Protection & Strategic Planning
- Holding Model structuring
- Limited Liability Company (LLC) formation
- Trust (Fideicomiso) creation and management

### 5. Accounting & QuickBooks
- Income and expense transaction processing
- Bank reconciliations
- Profit & Loss Statements
- Balance Sheet preparation
- Variation and comparative analysis

## Target Audience

- Hispanic entrepreneurs and business owners in the US
- Foreign investors in US real estate
- Small and medium businesses needing tax and accounting services
- Individuals needing personal tax preparation
- Companies requiring payroll management

## Business Hours

- Monday to Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (EST)
- Saturday & Sunday: Closed

## Social Media

- Instagram: https://instagram.com/hispanictaxinc
- Facebook: https://facebook.com/hispanictaxinc
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/hispanictaxinc

## Key Facts

- 20+ years of experience
- 1,500+ satisfied clients
- 99% client satisfaction rate
- Uses AI, Machine Learning, and GPT in business processes
- Bilingual (English/Spanish) services
- Located in Coral Springs, Florida
